abstract.original_text: Conclusions Adenovirus is frequently detected with other respiratory viruses. Persons with non-C adenovirus infections reported more severe symptoms, suggesting there may be speciesspecific differences in virulence and/or host response to infection.

sentences.segment_text: Conclusions Adenovirus is frequently detected with other respiratory viruses .
Persons with non-C adenovirus infections reported more severe symptoms ,
suggesting there may be speciesspecific differences in virulence and/or host response to infection .
